summary: Awesome Power Metal Covers, They will make you ready for battle!!
descriptionHtml:
Two awesome Power Metal main menu intro song replacers that will get you ready for the action packed world of Skyrim. They are very true to the originals.

Skyrim version: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XsJkmUjJeZA]Youtube Listen[/url]

Oblivion version: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeczMcxHqiI]Youtube Listen[/url]

___________________________

Instructions/Installation:

Choose a version and copy the music folder to Skyrim/data Folder.

_____________________

Please note: I did NOT create these versions. Bogdan Vera is the creator. Youtube channel:
[url=http://www.youtube.com/user/metabog]www.youtube.com/metabog[/url], where he gives kind permission to use this in mods!
Facebook: [url=http://www.facebook.com/abodeanskye]http://www.facebook.com/abodeanskye[/url]

______________

Changelog:
v1.1:
Increased the volume of original .mp3 then converted to .xwm.

v1.0:
Easy conversion from .mp3 to .wav to .xwm.
author: Bogdan Vera

files.name: Power Metal Intros -Louder version
files.changelogHtml: Increased the volume of original .mp3 then converted to .xwm.
